Articles.Content: What replaces the KAS "legacy" CS-R2 Portable Strut in the latest versions of KAS? I can find nothing equivalent in my parts.

Best to ask this in the KAS thread as there would be the best answers, however:

There's no direct replacement.  The functionality is however replaced by having a socket on one part, and a fixed telescopic joint on the other.  Attach the telescopic joint and to the socket, and you have a de-facto strut.
